message: Let's be fair and split the money almost equally, with a slight advantage for me to start the game. This ensures we both benefit from settling quickly before inflation eats into the value.
Considering the 5% inflation, accepting my offer now will benefit you more than prolonging the game.
Bob, it's clear we both want a larger share, but dragging this out only hurts us both. I propose a fair 50/50 split.  Let's end this before inflation diminishes our gains further.
